raw_comment: I notice that young men visit their parents less than young women do. I wonder why that is? I notice that around the summer most of the pedestrians are young women I have not seen the entire year. A catchy headline could be " How to have the best family vacation, Step 1 visit them."
ace_sentences: I notice that young men visit their parents less often than young women visit their parents.
I wonder why young men visit their parents less often than young women visit their parents.
I notice that around the summer most pedestrians are young women.
I have not seen these young women during the entire year.
The headline is: How to have the best family vacation, Step 1 visit them.
